response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily life. Considering its quality and the unique features it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly propose to offer it to you for $200. I understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so if this price aligns with what you perceive its worth, I'd be delighted to make the sale. If you need more information or have any concerns, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 200}
